## TokenErc1155Contract.increaseSupply() method

Increase the supply of an existing NFT

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
increaseSupply(to: string, tokenId: BigNumberish, additionalSupply: BigNumberish): Promise<TransactionResultWithId<BundleMetadata>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  to | string | the address to mint to |
|  tokenId | BigNumberish | the token id of the NFT to increase supply of |
|  additionalSupply | BigNumberish | the additional amount to mint |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TransactionResultWithId&lt;BundleMetadata&gt;&gt;
